tei:elementSpec.tei:desc: This defines a gaussian distribution. Its expectation value is 0.0. Attributes limit.lower and limit.upper are used to limit the range of random values.

tei:remarks.tei:p: An expectation value other than 0.0 would conflict with constant offsets and base values of the specific domain, such as asynchrony in the timing domain, dynamics in the dynamics domain, or duration modifiers in the articulation domain. These should be used to set an expectation value.
